parameters.name: Tid
parameters.description: The ID of the tenant. You can call the [GetUserActiveTenant](~~198073~~) operation to obtain the tenant ID.

parameters.name: Uid
parameters.description: The UID of the Alibaba Cloud account. You can view your UID by moving the pointer over the profile picture in the upper-right corner of the Data Management (DMS) console.

parameters.name: UserId
parameters.description: The ID of the user. You can call the [ListUsers](~~141938~~) operation to query the ID of the user.
